messages.message: When I go to delete a project - the documents get deleted but not the actual project - this is happening in prod on my account
@Andrew Sherrill could you open a ticket for this in the EPD board please
can you share more details Andrew? i'm not able to reproduce this; share your project ID? i'll likely ask the team to connect with you to reproduce

I just tried to recreate and get a video. Essentially - the product ID below is supposed to be deleted but still shows in my built apps pane (also below). I wanted to delete "Certa" to create a new "Certa" application from scratch, but went to delete and it only deleted the files, not the project
I have since tried to delete the project and it wont delete
can you share the video? thanks
I couldnt recreate it for the video
tried the same process on a new project and it worked properly
got it, i'll have the team take a look at that project id
